testsuite.name: com.saucedemo.tests.endtoend.TestAddtToCartAndOrderCreation
testsuite.system-out: User navigates to home page and verifies Product name, description and Price User navigates to product details page by clicking on Product link and verifies Product name, description and Price User clicks on Add to cart button and verifies the product quantity User navigates to Shopping cart page by clicking on shopping cart link and verifies Product name, description, Price and quantity User navigates to Checkout Informaion page by clicking on Checkout button User enters customer details like firstname, Lastname and Zipcode in Checkout Information page and clicks on continue button User navigates to Checkout overview page and verifies Product name, description, Price and quantity User navaigates to Checkout complete page and verifies complete image, Thank you message and Order dispatch message User navigates to Home page by clicking on Back to home button and verifies the current url
